file.name: 1-C_samples/1-delegate_create_db.c
file.description: Create a new Data Services (DS) Database and use it to manage Delegates. This sample allows you to create a new DS Database with an existing known ID file.

file.name: 1-C_samples/2-delegate_open_session.c
file.description: Open an existing Data Services (DS) Database. This sample allows you to open an existing DS Database and authenticate into it to create a DS Session.

file.name: 1-C_samples/3-delegate_set_server.c
file.description: Set Data Services (DS) Service location in DS Database. This sample sets the Server location in DS Database. This server is where the DS DB management interface is expected to be present.

file.name: 1-C_samples/5-delegate_add_delegates.c
file.description: Create a new Delegate and add a Subscription to Data Services (DS) Database. The Delegate is only added if it doesn't already exist in the DB.

file.name: 1-C_samples/4-delegate_add_users.c
file.description: Add a new user to the Data Services (DS) Database. A user is only added if it doesn't already exist in the DB.

file.name: 10-SampleSupportFiles/sampleid.xml
file.description: Defines a complete id, including rules and the user SampleUser@myemail.com

file.name: 4-UXL_samples/sample_workflow_delegate.uxl
file.description: Demonstrates a complete delegate example which includes creating a database, opening a database and using delegates.
